import React from 'react' import Footer from './footer' import Latest_courses from './latest_courses' import Navbar from './navbar' import Search_result from './search_result' import Trending_courses from './trending_courses' const Available_courses = () => { const searchCourses = () => { document.getElementById("myDropdown").classList.toggle("show") } return ( <>
